OmniScript.name: GasVolumeCalc

childElements.name: AvTempDiffWinter
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "show" : null, "label" : "Average Temp Differe", "disOnTplt" : false, "controlWidth" : 3, "showInputWidth" : false, "inputWidth" : 12, "required" : false, "repeat" : false, "repeatClone" : false, "readOnly" : false, "help" : false, "helpText" : "", "pattern" : "", "ptrnErrText" : "", "mask" : null, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "debounceValue" : 0, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "hide" : false, "defaultValue" : 45 }

childElements.name: BldgHeatVol
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "show" : null, "label" : "Annual Volume Bldg (m3)", "disOnTplt" : false, "controlWidth" : 4, "showInputWidth" : false, "inputWidth" : 12, "expression" : "(%CubicFeet%*%Insulation%*%WinterFactor%*0.0278/1000)*24*365", "hide" : false, "mask" : "###,##0.00", "dataType" : "Number", "hideGroupSep" : false, "dateFormat" : "MM-dd-yyyy", "HTMLTemplateId" : "" }

childElements.name: BldgHeatVolMcf
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "show" : null, "label" : "Annual Volume Bldg (Mcf)", "disOnTplt" : false, "controlWidth" : 4, "showInputWidth" : false, "inputWidth" : 12, "expression" : "((%CubicFeet%*%Insulation%*%WinterFactor%*0.0278/1000)*24*365*35.31)/1000", "hide" : false, "mask" : "###,###.00", "dataType" : "Number", "hideGroupSep" : false, "dateFormat" : "MM-dd-yyyy", "HTMLTemplateId" : "" }

childElements.name: CubicFeet
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "show" : null, "label" : "Feet3", "disOnTplt" : false, "controlWidth" : 2, "showInputWidth" : false, "inputWidth" : 12, "expression" : "%Width%*%Length%*%Hight%*%Floors%*%Units%", "hide" : false, "mask" : null, "dataType" : "Number", "hideGroupSep" : false, "dateFormat" : "MM-dd-yyyy", "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "required" : false, "repeat" : false, "repeatClone" : false, "readOnly" : false, "help" : false, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "debounceValue" : 0 }
